sentences.en: "Good lord, that's what he is: he's a policeman."
A few days earlier he had received a telegram from Lord Lloyd.
sentences.cn: 几天前，他收到劳埃德勋爵发来的一封电报。

sentences.en: Good morrow to you, my lord.
His nine-month sentence was overturned by Appeal Court judge Lord Justice Watkins.
sentences.cn: 上诉法院法官沃特金斯撤销了对他作出的9个月徒刑的判决。

sentences.en: I am Thine, O Lord, I have heard Thy voice.
sentences.cn: 主啊，我属于您，我已经听见您的声音。

sentences.en: I've got to go home, but Lord knows I dread it.
sentences.cn: 我必须得回家了，不过是个人都知道我很怕回去。

sentences.en: Lord Carrington is modest about his achievements.
sentences.cn: 卡林顿勋爵对自己取得的成绩非常谦虚。

sentences.en: Lord Fraser's speech offers much food for thought.
sentences.cn: 弗雷泽勋爵的讲演发人深省。

sentences.en: Lord Salisbury bought the picture at auction in London some years ago.
sentences.cn: 几年前，索尔兹伯里勋爵在伦敦拍得了这幅画。

sentences.en: Lord Swan was made a life peer in 1981.
sentences.cn: 斯旺勋爵于1981年受封终身贵族。

sentences.en: Love the Lord with all your heart.
Other directors appear happy that Lord Hollick has been squeezed out.
sentences.cn: 其他董事都因为霍利克勋爵被挤了出去而显得很高兴。

sentences.en: She prayed now. "Lord, help me to find courage."
sentences.cn: 她马上祈祷道：“上帝呀，请赐我勇气吧。”

sentences.en: She told us she was descended from some Scottish Lord.
sentences.cn: 她告诉我们她是某苏格兰勋爵的后裔。

sentences.en: The Lord Mayor follows at the rear in his gilded coach.
sentences.cn: 市长大人坐在他阔气的马车里在后面跟着。

sentences.en: The peace of the Lord be always with you.

words.tran_cn: 贵族气派，贵族式；高傲，威严
阁下；贵族身分（或权威）；统治

phrases.tran_cn: 暗黑之主（游戏中任务名称）
艾克顿公爵（英国历史学家）
布朗勋爵（曾担任英国石油公司首席执行官）
n. 最高法院的首席法官
对…作威作福，对…称王称霸；向…逞威风；对…摆架子
耶和华；万军之主（等于上帝）
(史)富有家族中主持圣诞聚会的人
宅邸主人（原指封建庄园主）
大人，阁下（对法官、主教和贵族的尊称）

trans.tran_en: a man in  medieval  Europe who was very powerful and owned a lot of land

trans.tran_cn: 主，上帝，勋爵（英国贵族的称号），阁下，大人，（中世纪欧洲的）领主
trans.tran_en: a man who has a rank in the  aristocracy  , especially in Britain, or his title
